snippet.title: [The Gambit Lost to Time] Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
Wishlist at: https://store.steampowered.com/app/3263640/The_Gambit_Lost_to_Time

In "The Gambit Lost to Time", assume the role of Mia - a time-travelling advisor seeking to save this world from an inevitable calamity. Choose between one of four distinct kingdoms to support, bond with fellow retainers, build up its infrastructure, and lead your strongest troops to victory!

Trailer Song: Recollection
Music: qfeileadh feat. Risa Kodaka @officialqfeileadh1081  @kodakavoice 

Coming soon in 2025!

#indiegame #turnbasedtactics
